definition: to throb/to pulse/to bounce/to jiggle/to jump about
to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
ByteDance, Beijing-based Internet technology company, founded in 2012

sentences.english: Pooling in the pelvic cavity. Which means her heart was stillpumping.
sentences.chinese: 骨盆腔有血液淤积，说明当时她的心脏还在跳动。

sentences.english: His heart is beating violently in her breast.
sentences.chinese: 他的心在胸膛里激烈地跳动。

sentences.english: For anybody who bounces, their tremolo will be a problem.
sentences.chinese: 如果谁的右手上下跳动，那么他的轮指一定有问题。

sentences.english: The firelight danced over her face, over the steep lines of her cheekbones.
sentences.chinese: 炉火在她的脸庞上跳动，照射出她高高的颧骨的线条。

sentences.english: Amyand I were actually able to see our little girl's heart actually beating through the protective cover.
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫真切地看到孩子的心脏在保护罩下跳动。

sentences.english: Their heart's still beating, the lungs are still breathing and so forth.
sentences.chinese: 心脏仍然在跳动，肺依然能呼吸。

sentences.english: Ticker is slang for one's heart because your heartbeats similar to the way in which a clock ticks.
sentences.chinese: 对，心脏是像钟表那样滴滴答答地跳动。

sentences.english: And the hopes that warble in my fluttering breast?
sentences.chinese: 你可听见希望在我跳动着的胸口鸣唱？

sentences.english: After 21 days, the heart is already beating and pumping blood.
sentences.chinese: 21天后，他们的心脏已经能够跳动并输送血液。

sentences.english: I could feel the beating of the blades in my chest.
sentences.chinese: 我能够感觉到胸腔里肺叶的跳动。

sentences.english: Terror dried her tears, and her heart almost stopped beating.
sentences.chinese: 她害怕得哭都哭不出来，心脏几乎停止跳动。

sentences.english: The sweeper cannot vibrate in high amplitude when sweeping the stuff.
sentences.chinese: 清扫器清扫物料时不会大振幅跳动。

sentences.english: One flicker and it was gone. Yet that was enough to set my heart wildly beating.
sentences.chinese: 一闪过后他便走了，但这已足够我的心脏狂烈跳动。

sentences.english: Finally, the measures to reduce the radial circle run-out error of the crankshaft main journal have be presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了减小曲轴主轴颈径向圆跳动误差的措施。

sentences.english: Inside was the still-beating heart of Davy Jones.
sentences.chinese: 里面装着戴维琼斯那颗怦然跳动的心脏。

definition: thumping sound (onom.)/to be eager and anxious (to do sth)/faithful and upright
to twitch/to throb/a spasm/to extract and use
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
